title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 702.3 - Disposition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 702.3 - Disposition

State Regulations

Declaratory rulings will be issued only in the discretion of
the department. Within 30 days of receipt of the petition in proper form, the
petition will be granted and a ruling issued or it will be deemed to have been
denied. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
702.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
